body.name: Stove Burner Covers - Reusable Stove Cover For 30 Inch LG Gas Range Model LRG3093 LRG3095 LRG3061 LRG3193 - Non-Stick Washable Stove Top Cover With 2Pcs Stove Gap Covers For 30 LG Stove Top Protector

features: 【Attention Gas Stove Compatibility】 The gas stove cover fit for LG gas ranges Models Kenmore72176033610/Kenmore72176037610, LDG3016, LDG3017, LDG3036, LDG3037, LRG3060, LRG3061, LRG3083, LRG3085, LRG3093, LRG3095, LRG3097, LRG3193, LRG3194.

【Heat Resistant】 Our gas stove top covers can withstand high temperatures up to 315°C/600℉ for gas stove and 230°C/446℉ for electric stove,without melting, burning, or deforming. Suitable for gas ranges, they provide excellent protection for your cooktop.Tips: Take care to avoid direct contact with fire!

【Safe and Non-toxic】 The stove protector is made of 0.3mm double layer thickness, PTFE coating, and fiberglass,which is BPA/PFOA Free, environmentally friendly and hygienic, no odor and no impact on, making it perfect for cooking with Samsung gas stoves. It completely fits your stove and keeps it beautiful.

【Easy to Clean and Reusable】 Our stove protectors for gas stove top has a non-stick coating that guard cooktop clean. If it gets dirty during daily use, simply wipe it with a towel. When it's too dirty, wash it with soap in the sink or dishwasher.

【You Will Get A Perfect Combination】 1PCS * Stove top guard + 2PCS * Silicone stove counter gap cover.The stove top protector liners are completely compatible with gas stoves and the precise perforations are integrated with the stovetop.the stove side gap guards can be trimmed based on the unique fit of your stove and counter.
body.description: Why Choose Us? THICKEST QUALITY Our stove mat protector has a premium non-stick coating on both sides that is 0.3mm thick,thicker than regular ones,fit perfect with Stove without curling. 100% Non-toxic & Withstands temperatures of up to 600F(315°C) Our stove mats are free from BPA, PFOA, and other toxic substances that can harm you and your family.the materials that can withstand high temperatures, protecting your stove from damage caused by hot pans and pots. Affordable Combo Kit Stove top mat perfectly matches silicone stove counter gap cover,they catch spills and drips, preventing them from damaging your stove surfaces and keeping stains from messing up your kitchen, which helps keep your cooktop looking like new for longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It didn't exactly fit our stove
reviews.reviewText: It didn't fit our stove, even though it was supposed to work for our model number. But it was easy to trim it to fit, and it's made a huge difference in cleaning. Just rinses off with hot water. Should have done this a couple years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Prior to me purchasing this one I had one that you had to cut yourself and put around the burners. Forget that get this instead. This is unbelievably easy to clean. Because it’s black you cannot see all of the oil spots and stains. You don’t even have to clean it as often. I’m very happy I got this. The only thing I would like or say that I could improve on is to make the plastic thicker so it doesn’t move as much or wrinkle when you clean it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product & Fit
reviews.reviewText: This product was purchased to protect a replaced a range top of an LG Smart Stove.This product fits the range top dimensions & burners perfectly.I highly recommend this for anyone looking to protect that high shine finish of their stove top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Thin and Pre-cut Fit is off
reviews.reviewText: These are very thin and the burner openings don't fit centered. They are off enough that spills easily get under it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps stove top clean
reviews.reviewText: Fits well and much easier to clean and spills. The edge silicone liner is nice also, easy to cut/fit.
